name: Park Race
description:
Race through the Park University Campus in Parkville, Missouri as it looked back in 2010 by yourself or with other people on the same network.

Enter your name where it says "Type your name"
Then select a car color.

If you are the first person, then click Start server to host the game on your machine.
If you are not, then click Connect to server to join the game that the first player created.

controls
w - forward
s - back
a - left
d - right

Made by a bunch of people studying Computer Science attending Park University in Parkville, MO around 2010.
